name: Easy Marinated Brussels Sprouts
author: Diana S.
summary: Very simple but delicious way to serve Brussels sprouts. If you have time, you may want to make your own Italian dressing; if not, the bottled kind works just fine. We like them as a side dish or even mixed into a tossed salad.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) bottle zesty Italian-style salad dressing
3 dashes hot sauce, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook Brussels sprouts in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender, about 15 minutes
Drain and transfer to a large bowl
Pour Italian dressing and hot sauce over Brussels sprouts; toss to coat
Marinate in the refrigerator, stirring occasionally, for 4 hours
